newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish shares close mixed in continuous trade.
newsitem.headline: Polish shares close mixed in continuous trade.

text.p: Six stocks fell, four rose and six were flat in 8.5-million-zloty Warsaw bourse continuous trade on Tuesday with the WIG 20 index up 0.9 percent to 1,501.7 points.
The remaining seven stocks did not trade.
Gorazdze trade remained suspended due to uncertainty on the firm's state after recent flooding.
Three National Investment Funds (NFIs) fell, two rose and four were flat in 0.4-million-zloty trade. Six did not trade.
NFI units rose 0.8 percent to 127 zlotys in a 6.1-million-zloty turnover.
